Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your daily operations or personal use. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $145. I'm confident this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
